semeval.mapping
Class NBRoleset

java.lang.Object
  semeval.mapping.NBRoleset

public class NBRoleset
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a nombank roleset. Contains an Id, and optionally 'source' and 'vnclass'.

Author:
Fabian Shirokov
